name: TransportMe
0:
”Alexa, open transport me”
”Alexa, ask transport me to find bikes near me”
”Alexa, open transport me and help”
skdetail:
Rated: Guidance Suggested. This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: transport me
des:
Do you need to quickly find the closest rental bike, scooter or station in your area? Let TransportMe help you!

TransportMe tells you the closest bike or scooter within a 1.25 mile radius of a given location. It will ask for a location to search in which can be an address or a partial address. You can search for bikes, scooters, bike stations, or a provider. It can also use your Alexa device's location by adding `near me` at the end of the command. It will notify you how far the vehicle is and will send a link of the location to your phone. If a station is searched, it will say the number of available vehicles.

We currently support Jump, Lime, Ofo, Spin, Pony, Byke, Mobike, Bird, Donkey, and Nextbike. 

Commands:
"find bikes"
"find scooters"
"find stations"
"find providers"
"find bikes near me"
"find scooters near me"
"find stations near me"
"find providers near me"
"help"
"repeat"
"find bikes in <address>" 
"find scooters in <address>"
"find stations in <address>", where <address> is the full or partial address.

--- UPDATES ---

[10/23/18]
You can now find bikes/scooters/stations with an address in one command!
For example, you can say:
"find bikes in <address>" where <address> is the full or partial address. 

[10/29/18]
We have added support for UK! You can new search for Obike, Yobike and Pony!
